text_block_list.text: Ara, Tama-chan… I just saw Rice-chan running through the hallway.
text_block_list.name: Super Creek

text_block_list.text:
Ahh. She had to rush to make sure her costume 
fit. I already told the dorm leader's that she'll 
be comin' back after curfew as well.
text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross

text_block_list.text: More importantly, Creek. About what'cha said before…
text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross

text_block_list.text:
It's real hard standin' by and watchin' ‘em, ya know? It'd be 
much easier to help ‘em out directly.
text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross

text_block_list.text:
Hehe… Tama-chan, when you and I become mothers, 
it'll be pretty hard on us, huh?
text_block_list.name: Super Creek

text_block_list.text: Welcome to the land of night… I-I am a vampire…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: What are you doing, Rice-san?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: Hya!? U-Umm… Well, you see…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: First, I would like to apologize…!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: What I am about to say will probably annoy you, but…! I… I want…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: I want to help you, Bourbon-san…!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: But Rice-san, you are…
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I know I will probably cause some kind of misfortune to happen, 
but… I can't just stand by and let you do all of this alone…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
That's why… I became someone other than Rice…! I adopted the 
persona of someone that could be useful to you…!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
And even if you refuse, I'll suck your blood and make you my 
follower…! I will help you, no matter what it takes…!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: A persona…
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Experiencing one's suppressed desires… Becoming someone different 
from oneself… I think that is the true purpose of Halloween, to 
achieve these desires through a transformation.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: There were so many things that I had not realized…
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: Huh…?
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
If I adopt a persona as well, will I be able 
to become someone other than myself…?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: B-Bourbon-san…?
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: I am not Mihono Bourbon… I am a ghost.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
To assist me in uninstalling the regrets of my 
former life, I will ask you a few questions.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I want to complete my tasks flawlessly. That was 
the mission I was assigned. However, at this 
point I am unsure if that is possible.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Essentially, once one takes on the responsibility of a task, one 
must see it through to the end, alone.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
However… once you realize that you initially miscalculated the 
amount of work necessary for the success of the Halloween party…
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
…Wouldn't accepting assistance be tantamount 
to failing my mission…?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: …Bourbon-san…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
It wouldn't be you failing your mission…! Because 
cooperation is the key to success!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
If someone were to offer to assist me with my work… 
wouldn't that mean that they have judged that I 
am unfit to complete the task at hand?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Th-That's not it…! Bourbon-san, no one will 
think less of you if you accept help…!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
But it was meant to be a job for me and me alone, wasn't it? If 
we were to change that, it will have an affect on the entire…
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
A-And if you were to collapse from overwork I think the others 
would be sad… No, I'm absolutely sure they would…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: But…
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: You won't need to say but anymore…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Hey, Ghost-san. You're just like me, aren't 
you. You have things that worry you too.
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
But… please listen to me. I want to be 
a part of this. I want to help you.
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
I don't want to see you in pain anymore, I just want 
to see you smile again… That's all I want…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
…Then would you assist me in dealing with 
the pumpkins that I destroyed earlier?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: ! Leave it to me!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: I'm a great eater after all!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: And finally the day of the Halloween party arrived.
Kyaa!? What the heck is that!? A zombie's… a zombie's hand…!!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
Heh heh heh… What a great smile! Let's see, this picture has you… 
and someone that you can't see in it!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text: Kyaaa!?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: Hehe, this year's Halloween party is very lively, isn't it?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
But we've still got plenty of frightening tricks 
prepared. Isn't that right…. Bourbon-san.
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Of course. Alerting the decoration committee 
and flipping the switch.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: Okay! Leave it to us!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirls

text_block_list.text: (Piiiiiii!! Bshwuuuuu!!)
text_block_list.name: Smoke Machine

text_block_list.text: Kyaa!?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: (Ssssssssss!)
text_block_list.name: Vacuum Cleaner

text_block_list.text:
Similar to that, there are various tricks here 
meant to amuse you and the other attendees.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Hehe… everyone's working together. Ehehe… 
even I was able to help a little.
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: (Glance)
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C

text_block_list.text: Ah… That child is all alone…
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Bite…!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: Huh?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Rob Roy-san, I just turned you into a vampire.
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
So why don't you make that child into one of us too? Because… 
vampire's can become friends with anyone, right?
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Plus I'm sure there's plenty of children that would 
love to be friends with you, Rob Roy-san.
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Everyone, the changing booth is this way! Even if you haven't 
requested a costume, we may have spare ones ready!
text_block_list.name: Super Creek

text_block_list.text:
Hmm, I'm mostly done guidin' the guests. Guess 
it's time for me ta get changed too.
text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross

text_block_list.text:
Ah, Bourbon. This year's Halloween's goin' great, 
ain't it? Everyone's workin' together so well, 
and you were an amazin' coordinator!
text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross

text_block_list.text:
That may be so, however, I would still like to apologize for all 
of the mistakes I had made up until now.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: Huh? Yer doin' that again…
text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross

text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much, Tamamo-san… I am truly grateful for the 
assistance that you provided me.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
…Haha, you've got a nice smile, don'cha. I'm sorry for all the 
trouble I put'cha through too. Anyways, I'ma go get changed.
text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross

text_block_list.text:
Understood… 
…………
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text: Everyone, Happy Halloween.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Please have a wonderful Halloween and have 
a great time with those you cherish.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
